item.title: Boot
item.description: The “ffxivboot.exe” executable is the main entry point for the game. item.title: ZiPatch Format
item.description: A ZiPatch file is the compressed format used by FFXIV to patch the games files. A newer version of this same format is used by FFXIV: ARR. This documentation is for the ZiPatch format which is used by FFXIV 1.0 - 1.23b. Note: ZiPatch files are all Big Endian.
